'swap' }} {{ step_number_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }} {{ step_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }} .section-{{ section.id }} { border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px; border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px; margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem; margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem; border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px; overflow: hidden; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { margin: 0 auto; padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; } .bundle-heading-{{ section.id }} { text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }}; } .bundle-heading-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ heading_color }}; line-height: {{ heading_height }}%; text-transform: unset; text-decoration: none; word-break: break-word; font-weight: 700; } .bundle-text-{{ section.id }} { marign-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px; text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }}; } .bundle-text-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ text_color }}; line-height: {{ text_height }}%; text-transform: unset; text-decoration: none; word-break: break-word; } .bundle-steps-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }}; gap: {{ steps_gap_mobile }}px; margin-top: {{ steps_mt_mobile }}px; } .bundle-step-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; flex-direction: column; } .bundle-step-circle-{{ section.id }} { margin: 0; font-size: {{ step_number_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ step_number_color }}; line-height: {{ step_number_height }}%; text-transform: unset; text-decoration: none; word-break: break-word; font-weight: 700; border-radius: 50%; padding: 10px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; flex-shrink: 0; width: {{ step_circle_size_mobile }}px; height: {{ step_circle_size_mobile }}px; background-color: {{ step_circle_bg_color }}; border: {{ step_circle_border_thickness }}px solid {{ step_circle_border_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .bundle-step-{{ section.id }}.active .bundle-step-circle-{{ section.id }} { color: {{ step_number_active_color }}; background-color: {{ step_circle_bg_active_color }}; border-color: {{ step_circle_border_active_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .bundle-step-text-{{ section.id }} { margin: 0; font-size: {{ step_text_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ step_text_color }}; line-height: {{ step_text_height }}%; text-transform: unset; text-decoration: none; word-break: break-word; font-weight: 700; text-align: center; } .bundle-body-{{ section.id }} { display: grid; margin-top: {{ layout_mt_mobile }}px; gap: {{ layout_gap_mobile }}px; } .bundle-grid-{{ section.id }} { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat({{ products_row_mobile }}, 1fr); gap: {{ products_gap_mobile }}px; } @media(min-width: 1024px) { .section-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px; margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem; margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem; border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { padding: 0 5rem; padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; } .bundle-heading-{{ section.id }} { text-align: {{ text_align }}; } .bundle-heading-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: {{ heading_size }}px; } .bundle-text-{{ section.id }} { marign-top: {{ text_mt }}px; text-align: {{ text_align }}; } .bundle-text-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: {{ text_size }}px; } .bundle-steps-{{ section.id }} { justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }}; gap: {{ steps_gap }}px; margin-top: {{ steps_mt }}px; } .bundle-step-{{ section.id }} { flex-direction: row; } .bundle-step-circle-{{ section.id }} { width: {{ step_circle_size }}px; height: {{ step_circle_size }}px; font-size: {{ step_number_size }}px; } .bundle-step-text-{{ section.id }} { font-size: {{ step_text_size }}px; text-align: left; } .bundle-body-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ layout_mt }}px; gap: {{ layout_gap }}px; } .bundle-grid-{{ section.id }} { grid-template-columns: repeat({{ products_row }}, 1fr); gap: {{ products_gap }}px; } } {%- endstyle -%} {% unless full_width %} {% endunless %} {% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %} {% endif %} {% if margin_horizontal > 0 %} {% endif %} {% if heading_custom %} {% endif %} {% if text_custom %} {% endif %} {% if step_number_custom %} {% endif %} {% if step_text_custom %} {% endif %}
